subject: Switch ON your penis!
body:
Can't satisfy your girlfriend? Do you want to?
Go to the shop
There is no need to parade your problems. There is no need to visit your local drug store. Cheapest Viagra and Cialis you can find! 
All this you can find here
Just buy medication called Viagra or Cialis and you'll have unbelievable sex 24/7!!!
With best regards,
Barbara Rodriquez
 
 
U nas net etogo vremeni! Dal-rokty vot-vot nachnut shturmovat ushchele! Znachit, my dolzhny zaderzhat ih i predostavit emu eto vremia. Dopolnit. Malo li chto mozhet sluchitsia po doroge v pogone za golubym Bankosom. Opershis na svoiu izzubrennuiu kosu, kostliavaia bezzvuchno hohotala i Shchelkala cheliustiami, vziraia na stol bogatyj urozhaj. 
Net! Ia popytalsia vskochit i uzhe v poslednij moment kraem glaza zametil Letiashchuiu sverhu nejrodubinku policejskogo. Mozhet byt, on i prav. I muzyka ego takaia zhe iarkaia, strashnaia, nebyvalaia skazka naiavu. I vse zhe vsia eta istoriia s Celitelem i Nkotom po-prezhnemu Predstavlialas ochen zagadochnoj i ne davala mne pokoia svoej Nezavershennostiu, otkrytyh voprosov bylo eshche velikoe mnozhestvo. Na moj vzgliad, ej mozhno bylo dat primerno Tridcat-tridcat piat mezhlet. Da i Vygliadel on huzhe, chem pri pervoj vstreche, v Siiaiushchem. V gorode eshche dvenadcat soten. No sejchas Altaresa volnovali bolee nasushchnye problemy. 
Netrudno bylo soobrazit, za kem Ostanetsia poslednee slovo pri liubom rasklade. Stop! oborval chuzhoj. Velikie altruisty? No kak s etim sviazat bojniu na ploshchadi? Nkot ne ostavil Ni edinogo shansa ni odnomu iz liudej shefira, okazavshihsia v zabroshennom Gorode. Shefir prekratil natisk, chtoby Vospolzovatsia stol prozaicheskim oruzhiem, i uspeshno. ejisuminyon UkFHXFBeQEp0RV1VHUFCUEZWRlleXR1XVA==
